const ODDS_API_KEY = ''936fff28812c240d8bb6c96a63387295'';
fetch\(''https://api.the-odds-api.com/v4/sports/basketball_nba/odds?apiKey='' + ODDS_API_KEY + ''&regions=us&markets=h2h,spreads,totals&oddsFormat=american''\)
  .then\(r => { console.log\(''Status:'', r.status\); return r.json\(\); }\)
  .then\(d => console.log\(''Games:'', Array.isArray\(d\) ? d.length : ''not array'', JSON.stringify\(d\).slice\(0,200\)\)\)
  .catch\(e => console.error\(''Error:'', e.message\)\);
")

import requests
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(\)

# Check PM US positions
headers = {
    ''Authorization'': f''Bearer {os.getenv\(""POLYMARKET_US_API_KEY""\)}'',
    ''Content-Type'': ''application/json''
}
resp = requests.get\(''https://api.polymarket.us/v1/positions'', headers=headers\)
positions = resp.json\(\)
print\(''=== PM US POSITIONS ===''\)
for p in positions.get\(''positions'', []\):
    if p.get\(''size'', 0\) != 0:
        print\(f""  {p.get\(''outcome'', ''N/A''\)}: size={p.get\(''size''\)} netPosition={p.get\(''netPosition''\)} marketTitle={p.get\(''marketTitle'', ''N/A''\)[:50]}""\)
")
